name: As far as I can tell, the time of the home theater universal remote is over. The good news is that all of my devices are network connected. My plan is to use a Flirc device to transform a nice, ergonomic remote into my perfect remote. Considering a TiVo peanut 😇

summary:
@blip I have a Flirc Skip 1s on order, but judging by the early feedback in their forums, I am not optimistic. The Sofabaton was an option, but it gets very very mixed reviews.
I’ve already coded up a network based controller for all of my devices, and my plan is to pair a TiVo Slide Pro remote with a Pi to create something totally bespoke.
